div.p: The Pharmacy Mobile and Distributed Medication Administration supplement introduces the interoperability mechanisms to be used in the requesting and registering of administration of medication, in mobile systems or otherwise distributed systems, as well as in traditional systems.
The use of this profile supports the administration of medication with a standard way to:

ul.li: register and exchange information about the administration of medication

td.p: Request for individual administration actions to be performed
Report on the outcome of each single administration event
